## IStyleTransform interface

样式转换接口，用于描述元素在空间中的定位、旋转和缩放。

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IStyleTransform 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [rotateX?](./j-html-design-editor.istyletransform.rotatex.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ 绕 X 轴旋转的值 |
|  [rotateY?](./j-html-design-editor.istyletransform.rotatey.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ 绕 Y 轴旋转的值 |
|  [rotateZ?](./j-html-design-editor.istyletransform.rotatez.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ 绕 Z 轴旋转的值 |
|  [scaleX?](./j-html-design-editor.istyletransform.scalex.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ 沿 X 轴的缩放值 |
|  [scaleY?](./j-html-design-editor.istyletransform.scaley.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ 沿 Y 轴的缩放值 |
|  [scaleZ?](./j-html-design-editor.istyletransform.scalez.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ 沿 Z 轴的缩放值 |

|  [skewY?](./j-html-design-editor.istyletransform.skewy.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ 沿 Y 轴的倾斜值 |
